      • createFile

        public static File createFile(String filepath)
                       throws CredibilityException,
                              IOException
        Parameters:
        filepath - the filepath to create file
        Returns:
        a new file on disk from filepath param. If the file already exists, the method do not override it, but returns the file
        Throws:
        CredibilityException - if a parameter is not valid
        IOException - if an error occured during file creation

        Parameters:
        directory - the directory to check
        extension - the file extension to search
        Returns:
        true if there is files with @param extension in @param directory

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occured during file deletion
